trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Tonopah
There were no other sightings in Tonopah on or around May 12th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsMy roommate and I were on our front porch talking when he yelled hurry turn around, look !!! He then got up quickly and ran as I was turning and getting up and we saw a really large glowing object in the sky coming down at an angle,it slowed,changed direction a little bit then stop for a second then continued coming down,it was red,Orange,yellow glowing and looked like it emitting something then it got lower and disappeared. We heard no noises at all .. we were and are really excited about it.
